Literature.Title: Analyses of dose-response curves to compare the antimicrobial activity of model cationic alpha-helical peptides highlights the necessity for a minimum of two activity parameters.
Literature.Author: Rautenbach M, Gerstner GD, Vlok NM, Kulenkampff J, Westerhoff HV

Literature.Title: Self-assembling organo-peptide bolaphiles with KLK tripeptide head groups display selective antibacterial activity.
Literature.Author: Naidoo VB, Rautenbach M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(IC50=29.8±1.1µM),Escherichia coli SPE 001(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SPM 101(MIC=2µg/ml)
